meanings.definition: A cosmetic applied to the eyelids to accentuate the eyes.
meanings.sent1: She carefully applied the eyeliner to make her eyes stand out.
meanings.sent2: Her makeup routine always includes eyeliner to enhance her eye shape.
meanings.sent3: When she sneezed, the eyeliner ended up on her forehead instead of her eyelids!
meanings.sent4: Her eyeliner was as dark as a moonless night, framing her eyes beautifully.
meanings.sent5: The eyeliner glided smoothly, creating a perfect line along her eyelids.

meanings.definition: A pencil or liquid used to line the eyes for cosmetic purposes.
meanings.sent1: She reached for her favorite eyeliner pencil to define her eyes.
meanings.sent2: The liquid eyeliner she used was waterproof and long-lasting.
meanings.sent3: He mistook the black eyeliner for a marker and almost drew on his face!
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like stars against the backdrop of her jet-black eyeliner.
meanings.sent5: With a steady hand, she applied the eyeliner perfectly along her lash line.
